subtitle: These light and airy puffs make the perfect end to any meal.

method.text: Roll out the pastry on a work surface, lightly dusted with flour, until very thin. Cut out 8 large star shapes and arrange on lightly dampened baking trays.
Halve, core and thickly slice the apples. Toss in the lemon juice to help prevent discolouration and drain off any excess.

Add the cinnamon and sugar to the apple slices and toss together until well coated. Brush the pastry stars with the beaten egg then arrange the apple slices on top. Leaving a small border around the edge of each.
Cook in oven for 15-20 min or until well risen and golden.
Remove from the oven. Carefully brush over with the apricot glaze. Serve either hot or cold,

title: Apple and cinnamon puffs
